        LayoutInline {B} at (0,0) size 556x19

      LayoutBlockFlow {P} at (0,278) size 784x20

        LayoutInline {B} at (0,0) size 59x19

            text run at (0,0) width 59: "Table II:"
        LayoutText {#text} at (58,0) size 402x19
          text run at (58,0) width 402: " introduces rowspan=2 for cells (2,2) and (3,1), which 'overlap'."
      LayoutBlockFlow {P} at (0,350) size 784x60
        LayoutInline {B} at (0,0) size 65x19
          LayoutText {#text} at (0,0) size 65x19
            text run at (0,0) width 65: "Table III:"
        LayoutText {#text} at (64,0) size 768x59
          text run at (64,0) width 704: " is Table II, but cells (2,3),(3,3) and (4,3) now have 'empty' contents; the resulting table is still OK. Note that the"
          text run at (0,20) width 767: "height of (2,3) and (4,3) is determined by cells (2,1) and (4,2) respectively, whereas (3,3) has ~0 height since no 'effective'"
          text run at (0,40) width 633: "cell in the row has any definite height requirement (except for border, margin, padding if applicable)."
      LayoutBlockFlow {P} at (0,426) size 784x40
        LayoutInline {B} at (0,0) size 64x19
          LayoutText {#text} at (0,0) size 64x19
            text run at (0,0) width 64: "Table IV:"
        LayoutText {#text} at (63,0) size 760x39
          text run at (63,0) width 697: " is Table III, but column 3 has been removed (cells (1,3),(2,3),(3,3),(4,3),(5,3)). This should mirror the first two"
          text run at (0,20) width 283: "columns of Table III (but currently does not)."
      LayoutBlockFlow {P} at (0,482) size 784x40
        LayoutText {#text} at (0,0) size 765x39
          text run at (0,0) width 765: "Note that cells (2,2) and (3,1) are still in the correct position, with the same size as Table III, but that their cellspacing with"
          text run at (0,20) width 153: "(5,1) and (4,2) is absent."
